Traits.Name: Gnashing Maw
Traits.Content: Can attempt a grapple against a creature within 10 ft.; grappled targets take 2d10 piercing damage and 2d10 acid damage at the start of each of their turns.

Traits.Name: Consume Metal
Traits.Content: When a nonmagical metal weapon or piece of armor strikes it, the wielder must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 14) or the item becomes corroded, decreasing its AC or damage by 1 permanently.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Ore Vein, Hungry makes three attacks: two with its Crystal Lash and one with Shatter Pulse.

Actions.Name: Crystal Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Shatter Pulse
Actions.Content: Recharge 5–6: The Ore Vein emits a crack of crystal energy. All creatures within 15 ft. must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 13) or take 9 (2d8) thunder damage and be deafened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Devour Essence
Actions.Content: A devastating attack that targets a creature within 10 ft. The target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 14) or take 30 (4d12 + 4) acid damage. On a failed save, the target is also blinded until the end of its next turn. This attack can be used once per long rest.
